entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this morning then changing to periods of rain mixed with wet snow near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
